Squizzy::

"Only half her motherboard was salvagable and even then, there was 
damage. Three quarters of her spark chamber was useable, I had to fix 
up the rest of it. She lost about a third of her memory. But to be on 
the safe side, I uploaded a program that will keep her loyal to 
Zardus. But I don't think that she is quiet the same as she was.  If 
zardus could give me the program he installed in her initially, I can 
upload it into her programs and return her to about 95% of what she 
was before she got killed the first time."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ turns to Squizzy after Feline walks out. "Exactly how much 
> permanent damage was done because of her death?"
> 
>
